s.text: Kurtz quotes Journal editorial writer John Fund's reaction: "A lot of the Republicans have grown up with this liberal media culture and are suspicious of journalists, so they have an exaggerated expectation of the few allies they have.

In a "Style" section piece about how conservatives have taken to turning on each other, Post media reporter Howard Kurtz reveals that "when the Wall Street Journal declared a few weeks ago that Newt Gingrich was in danger of becoming 'inconsequential,' the House speaker sent every member of the editorial board a letter saying he was disappointed in them."
